items.string: Vegana is a js framework to build single page apps with native support of a defined document structure for ease of developemnt in big teams, code sharing, native and fast lazyness for a smooth browsing experience and native js web api plugins for ease of use and faster development speeds.basic concept is to reduce final bundle size and break the bundle based on a document structure making the browsing experience smooth and fast.

items: tiny and broken up document structure

native api framework support with rocket iron and wet.

prebuilt native components and upcoming support for web compoenets.
defined code structure to make onboarding new devs easy for big teams.
